name: Magibullet Shooter Caspar
desc: You can activate "Magibullet" Spell/Trap Cards from your hand during either player's turn. If a Spell/Trap Card is activated in the same column as this card (except during the Damage Step): You can add 1 "Magibullet" card with a different name from that activated card from your Deck to your hand. You can only use this effect of "Magibullet Shooter Caspar" once per turn.
